What does Rivista do now?

-------

* Contact

* Commenting (WIP)

* Gemini (WIP)

* Interactivity (WIP)

* Navigation

* Profile

* Profile (Activity and Mood) (WIP)

* PubSub (WIP)

* Search

* Search (OSD) (WIP)
